title: Bug 18285: Double-clicking on import statement opens wrong type
description: When navigating through the package view outline, a double-click on a type import statement leads to the editor opening the referenced type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
OB: In Build 20020528, double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline opens the editor for the referenced type.
EB: In Build 20020528, when double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor should open the unit hosting the import reference, not the referenced type.
SR:
1. Open Build 20020528.
2. Navigate to the package view outline.
3. Double-click on a type import statement.
